critique: The document is a formal executive order addressing a national emergency related to banking and gold. It conveys a sense of seriousness and determination to address the crisis. It does not explicitly express joy, but it aims to restore stability and confidence, which could indirectly lead to joy. There is a sense of sadness due to the existing national emergency. There is no explicit anger, but there is a sense of urgency and resolve to address the situation. There is a sense of fear due to the ongoing emergency. There is no explicit disgust. There is a sense of surprise due to the unexpected nature of the emergency.
